name: Certification and licenses held by workers with a bachelor's degree or higher, by broad occupational group: 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: certification_or_license_held_and_primary_subject_of_certification_or_license
variableMeasured.description: Certification or license held and primary subject of certification or license hierarchy

notes: Workers in non-S&E occupations include those with a bachelor's degree or higher in STEM middle-skill and non-STEM occupations.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates (NSCG), 2019. Science and Engineering Indicators
